BuyerGroupMember.name: BuyerGroupMember
BuyerGroupMember.description: Represents a member of a buyer group.

BuyerGroupId.description: The ID of the buyer group to which the member belongs.

BuyerId.description: The ID of the account or guest buyer profile.

Name.description: The name of the buyer group member.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the member group or user.
